                </gmd:CI_Citation>
            </gmd:citation>
            <gmd:abstract>
                <gco:CharacterString>The False Creek Water Monitoring Program, is a community science initiative by Fraser Riverkeeper, a Swim Drink Fish initiative. It was launched in the summer of 2018 on Granville Island, Vancouver, British Columbia. Water samples at seven locations in and around False Creek were collected and processed weekly by staff and volunteer monitoring teams. Samples were analysed for E. coli levels at our new in-house Swim Drink Fish IDEXX lab and results shared with the public through the Swim Guide app. 
The program found that water quality in False Creek generally meets government guidelines. Bacteria levels are highest in the easternmost part of False Creek, near Olympic Village. After our first summer on the water, we recommend expanding the program to monitor year-round. This would improve our understanding of water quality during the rainy months and provide water quality information to the many people who use False Creek all year long. We also recommend collecting more samples at each location, to refine our testing results.</gco:CharacterString>
            </gmd:abstract>

keywords_translation_method.fr: Keyword text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

name: 10-25976-h8a2-4e30
notes:
The False Creek Water Monitoring Program, is a community science initiative by Fraser Riverkeeper, a Swim Drink Fish initiative. It was launched in the summer of 2018 on Granville Island, Vancouver, British Columbia. Water samples at seven locations in and around False Creek were collected and processed weekly by staff and volunteer monitoring teams. Samples were analysed for E. coli levels at our new in-house Swim Drink Fish IDEXX lab and results shared with the public through the Swim Guide app. 
The program found that water quality in False Creek generally meets government guidelines. Bacteria levels are highest in the easternmost part of False Creek, near Olympic Village. After our first summer on the water, we recommend expanding the program to monitor year-round. This would improve our understanding of water quality during the rainy months and provide water quality information to the many people who use False Creek all year long. We also recommend collecting more samples at each location, to refine our testing results.

notes_translated.en:
The False Creek Water Monitoring Program, is a community science initiative by Fraser Riverkeeper, a Swim Drink Fish initiative. It was launched in the summer of 2018 on Granville Island, Vancouver, British Columbia. Water samples at seven locations in and around False Creek were collected and processed weekly by staff and volunteer monitoring teams. Samples were analysed for E. coli levels at our new in-house Swim Drink Fish IDEXX lab and results shared with the public through the Swim Guide app. 
The program found that water quality in False Creek generally meets government guidelines. Bacteria levels are highest in the easternmost part of False Creek, near Olympic Village. After our first summer on the water, we recommend expanding the program to monitor year-round. This would improve our understanding of water quality during the rainy months and provide water quality information to the many people who use False Creek all year long. We also recommend collecting more samples at each location, to refine our testing results.
notes_translated.fr:
Le programme de surveillance de l'eau de False Creek est une initiative scientifique communautaire de Fraser Riverkeeper, une initiative de Swim Drink Fish. Il a été lancé à l'été 2018 sur Granville Island, à Vancouver, en Colombie-Britannique. Des échantillons d'eau prélevés à sept endroits dans et autour de False Creek ont été prélevés et traités chaque semaine par le personnel et des équipes de surveillance bénévoles. Les échantillons ont été analysés pour détecter les taux d'E. coli dans notre nouveau laboratoire interne Swim Drink Fish IDEXX et les résultats ont été partagés avec le public via l'application Swim Guide. 
Le programme a révélé que la qualité de l'eau à False Creek est généralement conforme aux directives gouvernementales. Les niveaux de bactéries sont les plus élevés dans la partie la plus à l'est de False Creek, près du village olympique. Après notre premier été sur l'eau, nous recommandons d'étendre le programme pour qu'il soit surveillé toute l'année. Cela nous permettrait de mieux comprendre la qualité de l'eau pendant les mois de pluie et de fournir des informations sur la qualité de l'eau aux nombreuses personnes qui fréquentent False Creek tout au long de l'année. Nous vous recommandons également de prélever davantage d'échantillons sur chaque site, afin d'affiner les résultats de nos tests.

notes_translation_method.fr: Description text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

description_translated.en: DataStream is an open access platform for sharing water and sediment quality data.
description_translated.fr: DataStream est une plateforme en libre accès pour partager des données sur la qualité de l'eau et des sédiments.

title: Fraser Riverkeeper Vancouver Community-Based Water Monitoring Program
